title: L.O.L. Surprise! OMG Dance Dance Dance B-Gurl Fashion Doll with 15 Surprises Including Magic Black Light, Shoes, Hair Brush, Doll Stand and TV Package - Great Gift for Girls Age 4+
features: UNBOX 15 SURPRISES including LOL OMG Surprise Dance Dance Dance OMG fashion doll B-Gurl and a black light to reveal additional glowing surprises
TV PACKAGE: Remove the front panel of the package to reveal a surprise- the image of your doll moves and "dances" when you pull the tab, as if she's dancing on TV

UNIQUE DANCE: B-Gurl has stunning features and styled hair, and she is articulated for tons of dancer poses. Plus, she’s the big sister to fan favorite LOL Surprise character, Beats. Unbox B-Gurl’s unique dance move and own the dance floor
FIERCE FASHIONS: Dress B-Gurl in her fierce fashions and fabulous accessories. Pro Tip: Hands are removable for easy dressing for little girls
PACKAGE BECOMES PLAYSET: Each dancing doll's package becomes reusable playset with the screen and dance floor, making this toy for girls even better
description: OMG we sisters are ready 2 groove. We are here to Remix your moves and create the ultimate Dance Dance Dance with fierce style. Everyone will be Dancing with the B.B.s as you unbox dance moves and put them together in your own way. Get out on the dance floor and dance UR heart out! Now that we have the ultimate LOL Surprise music, we need the ultimate dance moves. Throughout the series, fans will be able to collect and learn dance moves, then remix them into their own dances, so they can have a dance off with their friends. Unbox LOL Surprise Dance Dance Dance OMG fashion doll – B-Gurl – with 15 surprises. B-Gurl takes Breakdancing to the next level with her power moves and fierce fashion sense. She has stunning features, beautiful hair and her own fabulous style. Plus, she’s the big sister to fan favorite LOL Surprise character, Beats! Unbox the TV package, where each character actually moves on the perforated Dance “screen” when you remove the top cover and pull the tab. Unbox B-Gurl’s unique dance move and own the dance floor! Check out the magic black light surprises inside the package. Unbox her fabulous garment bag to reveal a fashion and open her hat box to find her accessories. Have her strike a pose to show off her included doll stand. The package becomes a reusable play space for B-Gurl to show off her moves. Includes a fashion doll, fashions, shoes, accessories, hat box, black light, hair brush, garment bag, sticker, hanger, doll stand and reusable package play space. Collect all 4 LOL Surprise Dance Dance Dance OMG fashion dolls and put on the greatest dance-off the universe has ever seen! Create and remix your own choreographed dances as you unbox each doll’s move! Will you unbox a character whose style is Old School or New School? Or, find an M.C. to lead the B.B.s in a dance doll dance off. From MGA Entertainment, creators of Rainbow High, Na Na Na Surprise, Little Tikes, Poopsie Surprise and many other favorite brands. From MGA Entertainment, creators of LOL Surprise dolls, Rainbow High dolls, Na Na Na Surprise dolls, Little Tikes, Poopsie Surprise girls dolls and many other favorite brands. Great gifts for kids who love dancing, ballet and jazz.
